: : Kup : :

Kup follows the others into the Ark. He stays next to Grimlock.

Kup: So old friend, I'm sure we have a lot to catch up on.


foxmanroar1@... wrote:
Grimlock waved his hand. "Due as you wish, i must check on the friends that scourge has not yet made off with... " He transformed and looked at Kup, you may follow old friend."
